field.name: state
field.label: Plugin State
field.description: Choose to either activate or deactivate the plugin.(using this way to disable the plugin instead of unpublishing will prevent the brackets [[ ]] from showing up.)

field.name: defaultWidth
field.label: Default Width
field.description: Choose a width of embed resources as integer number (example: 300) or leave empty for auto.

field.name: custom_site
field.label: Custom oEmbedder base URL servers
field.description: Put a URL to use your custom ELiS site (example: http://demo.elibsystem.ru). Use Line-break for multiple servers
